Plan
Your Event
Rhythm & Smooth offers flexible vendor policies, easy set up and a great open floor plan to make your special event a success.
Open 7 days a week
for events and ballroom dancing.
For more information please call:
407-339-3301
or email:
info@rhythmandsmooth.club
Prefer to make your reservation via phone?
Give us a call!
Our Phone number is 407-339-3301.

Events
at Rhythm
&
Smooth
Rhythm & Smooth
is the perfect location for you to host any private party, large or small and celebrate your special occasion in true style.
Rhythm & Smooth
is the perfect location for you to host any private party, large or small and celebrate your special occasion in true style.
Rhythm & Smooth provides tables of all sizes, Chiavari (aka Tiffany chairs) chairs, and linens – black, white or ivory at no additional cost! We also include our custom color light system, uplighting, and state of the art sound system. Call today, 407-339-3301 for a price quote and to find out more about our inclusive services.
Our second story location overlooking Lake Concord gives your event complete privacy with beautiful views.
Our kitchen is designed with your caterer in mind. It has received high accolades for being well appointed in serving guests.
Conveniently located in the beautiful Lake Concord District of Downtown Casselberry, on 17-92 and Concord Drive. There are many hotels in the local area for out of town guests.

Visit our
Plan Your Event
Page to inquire about a specific date and event you would like to plan or call us now for pricing specific to your event.
Considering a gala, dance or concert? Consider the ballroom at Rhythm & Smooth.
Wedding receptions fare well in this setting, but romantic endeavors are not the only option for this venue. Kick-off bashes, welcoming parties, appreciation dinners and dances as well as business social hours are in full swing at Rhythm & Smooth.
